features: 18" x 5.6" size: The mop head is made of microfiber, which is soft and durable, and can effectively clean dust, dirt, and stains on various surfaces without leaving streaks. It is suitable for cleaning floors, windows, ceilings, cars, and more.

Wet & dry use: The mop head can be used for both wet and dry cleaning. When used dry, it can effectively pick up dust and debris, and when used wet, it can mop up spills and liquids. It is very versatile and can meet your different cleaning needs.

Machine washable: The mop head is machine washable, which makes it easy to clean and reuse. After each use, just throw it into the washing machine and it will come out as good as new. It is very economical and environmentally friendly.

Reusable and durable: The mop head is made of high-quality materials, which makes it durable and long-lasting. It can be used repeatedly for a long time, saving you money on buying disposable mop heads.

Wide application: The mop head is suitable for various cleaning tasks, such as cleaning floors, windows, ceilings, cars, and more. It is widely used in hotels, restaurants, schools, hospitals, and other public places.
body.description: This Commercial 18 Inch Mop Head is perfect for wet and dry cleaning. It is made of microfiber material, which is soft, durable, and lint-free, making it ideal for cleaning hardwood, tile, laminate, and other hard surface floors. The mop head is machine washable and can be reused multiple times, reducing waste and saving money in the long run. It is also compatible with any microfiber flat mop system, making it a versatile cleaning tool for home or commercial use. The mop head is designed to trap and hold dirt, dust, and debris, leaving your floors clean and streak-free. It is easy to attach and remove, and can be washed and dried quickly, making it a convenient and efficient cleaning solution.
